### NOAA Dataset 

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)
library(dplyr)
library(rnoaa)
```

```{r}
data("ny_noaa")
ny_noaa = 
  ny_noaa |> 
  mutate(date = ymd(date)) |>
  select(-id, -tmax, -tmin) |>
  filter(
    !is.na(prcp),
    snow != 0 
  ) 
```
